data.text: @plettkeman @hectorfl72 @SunSentinel You are dense, the other dummy said masks have been proven to not work. I showed that not be true. Masks work to varying degrees depending on the type and the setting they are used in. Either post something proves they don't work or  sit this out and STFU.
@johnawelk @hectorfl72 @SunSentinel These aren't as definitive as you would like to believe they are.

@IridescentAshes @SunSentinel Okey-dokey, Immunologist Dr. Bridle: "The more vaccinated the country is, the more problems they are having" 1:06 Cancer is out of control due to lower T-CELLS after vaccination. 3:40 why doctors are not submitting vaccine injury reports. https://t.co/ikjJCJAgKH
@SunSentinel You don’t know why some people still wear them so back off and let them be.
@SunSentinel If anyone come at me with that you’ll be handed a business card with my Oncologist number on it. Tell that to him.
